creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:

creator: gorzala@web.de
text:
I have also that problem. I am running a fresh install on linux. The problem
occurs for example, when you want to create a new page.

creator: dagss@student.matnat.uio.no
text:
Did you try to use Java JVM 1.4.2? This is similar to a known issue I experience
regarding Lenya and Java 1.5.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Is it exactly the same error on Windows and on Linux?

creator: agallardo@agsoftware.dnsalias.com
text: Is not this issue the same as #33966?

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: No new reports. Should be fixed.
